page.title: 07Finance
page.content: There are two banks in our area,both are located in the centre of Dyserth. The National Westminster Bank "The Action Bank" employs four people and has a computer terminal.This is where our schools dinner money is banked. Across the road is the Midland Bank. "The Listening Bank"which employs two people.Our school has two accounts here,one for the sale of crisps and the other to purchase education equipment. Friday is the busiest day for both Banks. Down the road is the Post Office and Newsagent which employs thirtyone people.It's busiest day is Thursday when most people cash their Pensions and Family Allowances. The children of Ysgol Hiraddug are able to save weekly through the Abbey National Building Society.Ysgol Melyd use the Trustees Savings Bank.
